> ::Grimlock::
> 
> In the course of the fighting Grimlock manages=
 to look up and catch 
> the incoming Minion Sweeps and their missiles.
=
> 
> Grimlock points up trying to point this out to Lord Perseus=
.
> 
> Grimlock: Me Grimlock think we see replay of Atlantis fight!
&=
nbsp;
Myrmidon continues to move across the ground in feline mode, his foot=
falls whisper silent and carefully placed. He chuckled lightly to himself a=
s he spotted Grimlock in the distance and made his way towards them.
 =

It was only as he got close to them, not quite in leaping range when he sa=
w Grimlock motioning upwards and trying to get another Maximal=92s attentio=
n. As Myrmidon followed Grimlock=92s gesture and saw the incoming host of s=
weep, he grimaced to himself as he readily remembered what happened the las=
t time they came, and the ease in which he was dispatched. But then again t=
hey had caught him from unawares, this time he was prepared!
 
With ca=
reful steps he attempted to move away from Grimlock, hoping that the stealt=
h this mode was designed for would get him away from there. He did not want=
 to have to fight two enemies at once. =96 .oO(then again) he thought to hi=
mself, .oO(it may take both teams to bring this quarry down.) 
 
Myrmi=
don continued to try and move away without being spotted as he opened a rad=
io channel to Hydras, "Sir, Minions of Unicron are here! Battle is upon us!=
!"
 
-------------
 
OOC: This swarm of sweeps that is now flying=
 towards Hydras=92 base is not as large as the one that attacked Atlantis. =
It is maybe less then half, maybe a third. But it still appears to be quite=
 formidable. And although Cyclonus' missiles are the ones streaking towards=
 the base, he has yet to be seen.
 
Also, Airly and Robo, please check=
 your emails, I have sent some email. 
 
Preston
(Myrmidon)

 


=
